Package game.player.game_modes

Interface GameMode

All Known Implementing Classes:
Challenge, SandBox
public interface GameMode
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Muhammad Naqeeb Alam
See Also:
Player, Challenge, SandBox, this class consists of methods that will be used for chosen game mode by the player
